subject: Hello SIR/MA.
body:
Hello SIR/MA.
I am very sorry I have to reach you through this medium. I am a member
of the International Debt Recovery Unit and I am aware of your ordeal
about your unpaid fund.
It may interest you to know that not long after the Debt Management
Office (IMF) completed the merger and acquisition process of all
pending payments occasion through the petition raised by the
international community about their unpaid funds. I discovered that
their boss connived with some top officials to divert funds approve to
settle unpaid inheritances, email lottery winners, Internet scam
victims, unclaimed consignments(concealed funds) and International
Contractors.
The IMF has already given approval for the payment of your fund but
they deliberately withheld your payment file and continue to demand
fees from you through their associates from different unassigned
affiliates mostly from Africa, US and the Netherlands all in an
attempt to frustrate you and enrich themselves. I wonder why you
havenâ€™t notice all this while.
Take note the you will provide the mandetory detail belwow becauswe it
is important for confirmation before your funds can be Released in
your favor
1= ADDRESS
2=CURRENT JOB
3=ID OR DRIVERS LINSENCE
4= $50 FOR REGISTRATION FORM DUTIES
You may choose to disbelieve this email as inconceivable but my
doctrine does not permit such act, reason I have to open up to you to
seek the right channel. Your fund was authorize to be paid to you
through the IMF asset management firm with a Claim Code Numbers, which
was supposed to have been issued to you before now.
Upon your response, I shall guide you through and provide you with
details to contact the assigned affiliate who will expeditiously
facilitate the release of your fund.
Thanks and have a wonderful day.
MRS LOVETH YOUNG
EMAIL ADDRESS (
lovethyoung756@gmail.com
)

subject: Re:   Hello SIR/MA.
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate you sharing this information with me. Can you please provide more details about the process of releasing the funds? How can I ensure that everything is legitimate before proceeding further?

Best wishes,
Dorothy

subject: Re: Hello SIR/MA.
body:
Attn: Mrs. Dorothy

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your email with the contents well
noted to my understanding, but like I said  I am a member
of the International Debt Recovery Unit and I am aware of your ordeal
about your unpaid funds. It may also interest you to know that not long
after the Debt Management
Office (IMF) completed the merger and acquisition process of all
pending payments occasion through the petition raised by the
international community about their unpaid funds. I discovered that
their boss connived with some top officials to divert your funds to
himself, and that is why I had to write to you to inform you about it so
you will be fast and receive your funds now that I am here as I will make
sure that you received your funds into your account once you follow all my
instructions to you.

Take note that you will provide the mandatory detail below because it
is very much important for confirmation before your funds can be Released in
your favor


1= ADDRESS
2=CURRENT JOB
3=ID OR DRIVERS LICENCE
4= $50 FOR REGISTRATION FORM DUTIES

Once you pay the requested fee of $50 for the registration form duties your
funds will be released to you on any of the way you wanted it to paid to
you.

I wait to hear from you
Thanks
MRS LOVETH YOUNG


  n Tuesday, February 20, 2024, Dorothy <bz06909@***.com> wrote:

subject: Re: Hello SIR/MA.
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate you reaching out about my unpaid funds. Can you please provide more details about the process for receiving the funds? How can I ensure that everything is done correctly so that I can receive the payment as soon as possible?

Best wishes,
Dorothy

subject: Re: Fwd: Hello SIR/MA.
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate you reaching out about the unpaid funds situation. Can you provide more details about how the Debt Management Office IMF completed the merger and process of pending payments? I'm curious to learn more about the steps involved in ensuring that individuals receive their funds.

Best wishes,
Dorothy
